Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2019...
Traded from Philadelphia to Colorado on 3/2/2019 (Going to COL: P Vinny Rivera. Going to PHI: C James Linsey)...
Injured on 5/1/2021 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/19/2021 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/24/2021 with a Sore Elbow, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/8/2022...
Traded from Colorado to Cincinnati on 2/3/2024 (Going to COL: 1B Estanis Aguilar, P Bob Largent, CF Jose Gula, P Pablo Martinez, C John Smith. Going to CIN: P Vinny Rivera, P Rick Adamski)...
Had first career hit on 4/15/2024, off Allan Brown (SEA)...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $600,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/17/2025 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 6 weeks...
